parameters.name: originAddress
parameters.description: The origin zip code (US only) of the shipment. If you send this parameter, also send `destination_address`.

parameters.name: destinationAddress
parameters.description: The destination zip code (US only) of the shipment. If you send this parameter, also send `origin_address`.

parameters.name: distanceMi
parameters.description: The total distance (in miles) of the shipment. You can use this parameter in place of `origin_address` and `destination_address`.

parameters.name: weightLb
parameters.description: The total weight (in pounds) of the shipment.

parameters.name: transportationMethod
parameters.description: The primary transportation method of the shipment.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of a donation to the CarbonFund nonprofit. Ids are returned when a donation is created. If an ID is not provided, the total stats for all donations to CarbonFund are returned.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: The amount of the donation in cents.

parameters.name: nonprofitId
parameters.description: The id of a nonprofit from the CHANGE network.

parameters.name: fundingSource
parameters.description: Source of the donation funds. If you are collecting payment from your customer for the donation, use `customer`.

parameters.name: zipCode
parameters.description: The customer's zip code. Provide this to unlock geographic insights.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of transactions to offset.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Which page to return. This endpoint is paginated, and returns maximum 30 donations per page.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of a donation. Ids are returned when a donation is created.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page to return. This endpoint is paginated, and returns up to 30 nonprofits at a time.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of a nonprofit from the CHANGE network.
